titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, e16507: Bereshit Rabba

notesStmt.note: Palimpsest on codex page: Bereshit Rabba as overwriting; Ezek in Palestinian Aramaic as underwriting. Poorly mounted, with center margin and top intact. Verso seems to be the same continuous document. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts. Discolored, shriveled, mutilated.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE)

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection. Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
